title: Streaming League and Talking Politics. I've been told i'm reasonable.
body:
Please come ask me my thoughts on something political. I love talking politics even more so with those i disagree with! I don't get offended over anything. I only ask that you keep things civil! 

You can ask me anything on any topic though does not have to be politics and I will give you my thoughts!

https://www.twitch.tv/commonsatyr

Happy hunting guys!
